# commandQueue

**Instance Property**

Returns the command queue that the layer uses for drawing operations.

## Declaration

```swift
var commandQueue: any MTL4CommandQueue { get }
```

## Discussion

Should only be called with when supporting Metal4 through configuration. [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/cp_layer_renderer_configuration_set_supports_mtl4]
title: commandQueue
